entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
